markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Erratic](/Traits.aspx?ID=275)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 251</row>

Planes with this trait have a flow of time that slows down or speeds up relative to other planes.
name: Erratic
